I can answer to your first question. There is elitism in the version 
of NE=
AT you mention. Check out the species::reproduce() method. There 
is a comp=
arison of poolsize with 5 in order to produce the champ.. At 
least I remem=
ber that :) So basically this means that when a species 
size is greather t=
han 5, the champ is cloned into the next generation 
unchanged.
But when I =
make a search, I keep a list of the best ever networks 
that appeared manua=
lly, I perform a quick search over the population 
at each generation.
You =
can create another NEAT parameter and replace the 5 constant with 
the vari=
able, so you can tweak it later via the parameters file. 

Peter

--- In ne=
at@yahoogroups.com, Jean-Baptiste Mouret / Mandor
